meanings.sent1: After studying the anatomy, the students learned about the ilea in the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's ilea during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The ilea in the model looked like tiny tubes winding around.
meanings.sent4: The ilea were like small tunnels transporting nutrients in the body.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a diagram to show the location of the ilea in the digestive system.

meanings.definition: The third and lowest division of the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: The ilea play a crucial role in absorbing nutrients from food.
meanings.sent2: Digestive enzymes break down food in the ilea to extract nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The ilea were so tiny, they seemed like secret passageways in the body.
meanings.sent4: The ilea acted like a sponge, soaking up all the essential vitamins.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how the ilea help in the digestion process.
